root.description: BasicNft: A simple ERC721 NFT contract that allows users to mint unique NFTs with a tokenURI. Each NFT represents a "Doggie" and is assigned a unique token ID.  MoodNft: An ERC721 NFT that dynamically changes its appearance based on mood. Owners can flip between "HAPPY" and "SAD" states, with the metadata updating accordingly.
root.name: NFTcontracts
